items.sentence: Tom went to Boston last year to live with his grandmother.
Tom went to the drugstore to get the medicine Mary needed.
Tom will try to persuade Mary to go to the dance with him.
Tom wondered how Mary had learned to speak French so well.
You know Tom will never let you live this down, don't you?
Tom says you were the one who talked him into coming here.
Is this one of the trees that you're planning to cut down?
Tom didn't have the same opportunities that you and I had.
After lunch, we put on our packs and started hiking again.
I'm shocked at Tom's sheer lack of empathy and compassion.
